backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of prewritten summaries describing major frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining romantic color variables and theming, including dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/README-assets.md: Guide explaining how to replace the three background images and notes that music is removed.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router with three pages and wraps the app in an error boundary.
frontend/src/assets/staticAssets.ts: Exports paths for three background images used across pages.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays a styled fallback UI and reload button on errors.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundAudioP: Empty placeholder file for audio provider.
frontend/src/components/EnterWebsiteGate: Love‑themed entry gate with animated hearts requiring user interaction before showing content.
frontend/src/components/FullscreenBackgr: Full‑screen background wrapper rendering letterboxed images with a dark overlay.
frontend/src/components/RomanticButton.t: Reusable romantic‑styled button supporting default and small size variants.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Root layout containing an Outlet for nested route rendering.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating backend actors based on identity and refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context and provider managing login, identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, base styles, custom fonts, and multiple animation keyframes used across the site.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders the App root component.
frontend/src/pages/FinalPage.tsx: Displays the final page with a background image and a long love letter plus a signature overlay.
frontend/src/pages/IntroPage.tsx: Shows the intro background, title, message, and a delayed CTA that navigates to the proposal page.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalPage.tsx: Renders the proposal question with a YES button that navigates to the final page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions including colors, fonts, radii, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature summaries, known issues, and build-related notes for the romantic multi-page site.
